mapper.update:
update quiz_record
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUIZ_OBJECT = #{record.quizObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER_TIME = #{record.answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME = #{record.respondentAnswerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
RESPONDENT_STATUS = #{record.respondentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUIZ_CONTENT = #{record.quizContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
QUIZ_ANSWER = #{record.quizAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
RESPONDENT_ANSWER = #{record.respondentAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update quiz_record set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUIZ_OBJECT = #{record.quizObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER_TIME = #{record.answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME = #{record.respondentAnswerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESPONDENT_STATUS = #{record.respondentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUIZ_CONTENT = #{record.quizContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, QUIZ_ANSWER = #{record.quizAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESPONDENT_ANSWER = #{record.respondentAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update quiz_record set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUIZ_OBJECT = #{record.quizObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER_TIME = #{record.answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME = #{record.respondentAnswerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESPONDENT_STATUS = #{record.respondentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update quiz_record
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUIZ_OBJECT = #{quizObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER_TIME = #{answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME = #{respondentAnswerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
RESPONDENT_STATUS = #{respondentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUIZ_CONTENT = #{quizContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
QUIZ_ANSWER = #{quizAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
RESPONDENT_ANSWER = #{respondentAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update quiz_record set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUIZ_OBJECT = #{quizObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER_TIME = #{answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME = #{respondentAnswerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESPONDENT_STATUS = #{respondentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUIZ_CONTENT = #{quizContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, QUIZ_ANSWER = #{quizAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESPONDENT_ANSWER = #{respondentAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update quiz_record set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUIZ_OBJECT = #{quizObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER_TIME = #{answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME = #{respondentAnswerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESPONDENT_STATUS = #{respondentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ID id, QUIZ_CONTENT quizContent, CASE WHEN STATUS = '0' THEN NULL ELSE QUIZ_ANSWER END quizAnswer, CASE WHEN RESPONDENT_STATUS = '0' THEN NULL ELSE RESPONDENT_ANSWER END respondentAnswer, ANSWER_TIME answerTime, RESPONDENT_ANSWER_TIME respondentAnswerTime, CREATE_TIME createTime FROM quiz_record WHERE CASE_ID = #{caseId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO quiz_record ( id, case_id, quiz_object, quiz_content, creater_id, create_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{caseId}, #{item.quizObject}, #{item.quizContent}, #{userId}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT q.id id, q.quiz_object quizObject, q.quiz_content quizContent, u.name arbiName FROM quiz_record q , user_info u WHERE q.creater_id = u.id AND case_id = #{caseId}
